changelog.zh:
- 新增：完整的日志系统，支持Debug/Release/Off三种级别
- 新增：日志导出功能，支持扫码查看和下载
- 新增：设置页面日志级别选择和清空日志功能
- 新增：日志文件位置显示，支持点击打开文件夹
- 修复：Android TV端应用初始化崩溃问题
- 修复：Android TV端黑屏恢复问题
- 优化：统一使用日志服务替代debugPrint
- 优化：日志系统默认关闭，减少性能开销
changelog.en:
- Added: Complete logging system with Debug/Release/Off levels
- Added: Log export feature with QR code viewing and download
- Added: Log level selection and clear logs in settings
- Added: Log file location display with folder opening support
- Fixed: Android TV app initialization crash
- Fixed: Android TV black screen recovery issue
- Improved: Unified logging service replacing debugPrint
- Improved: Logging disabled by default to reduce overhead
